title: Strategic Utilization of On-Demand Hint Effectiveness in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where secondary education practitioners utilize mathematical tools to support scientific problem-solving processes.

learning_goals: Learners can strategically request hints during mathematical problem-solving processes to enhance self-directed learning abilities
Learners can reduce problem-solving time by 20% and improve efficiency using an on-demand hint system

Over six months, learners collaborate with ten peer developers to collect over 500 hint usage log data entries, analyze correlations between hint types and code completion time using Python/Pandas, and propose at least three personalized learning strategies improving individual learning efficiency by over 20%.

resources: Learning Analytics Tool (Hint Usage Log Tracking)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
